titlepage.titleproper: Register of the Walther Schevenels Papers, 1901-1986
titlepage.publisher:
Hoover Institution Archives
Stanford University
Stanford, California
titlepage.p: © 1998 Hoover Institution Archives. All rights reserved.

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.abstract: Correspondence, reports, speeches, writings, notes, bulletins, interviews, pamphlets, clippings, and printed matter, relating to European and international trade unions, the labor movement in Europe, communism in the labor movement, and the post-World War II European Recovery Program.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: The Hoover Institution Archives only allows access to copies of audiovisual items. To listen to sound recordings or to view videos or films during your visit, please contact the Archives at least two working days before your arrival. We will then advise you of the accessibility of the material you wish to see or hear. Please note that not all audiovisual material is immediately accessible.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: For copyright status, please contact the Hoover Institution Archives

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Walther Schevenels Papers, [Box no.], Hoover Institution Archives.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Acquired by the Hoover Institution Archives in 1977.

accruals.head: Accruals
accruals.p: Materials may have been added to the collection since this finding aid was prepared. To determine if this has occurred, find the collection in Stanford University's online catalog at http://searchworks.stanford.edu/. Materials have been added to the collection if the number of boxes listed in the online catalog is larger than the number of boxes listed in this finding aid.

chronitem.event: Secretary, Federation of Metalworkers, Antwerp, Belgium
General Secretary, Provincial Federation of Metalworkers, Antwerp
Lecturer, National Labor College, Uccle-Brussels and Popular University Extension, Antwerp
Executive member, Socialist Party; Honorary Director, Cooperative Union, Antwerp; Secretary, Provincial Parliament, Antwerp
Assistant General Secretary, International Federation of Trade Unions, Amsterdam
General Secretary, International Federation of Trade Unions, Amsterdam, Paris, London
Assistant General Secretary, World Federation of Trade Unions, Paris. Resigns in dispute with Communists, 1949
Secretary, Trade Union Advisory Committee for the European Recovery Program (Marshall Plan)
General Secretary, European Regional Organization of the International Confederation of Free Trade Unions, Brussels
Author, Summarized Technology of Metal Industry and TradeUnion Administration

scopecontent.p: Bank book, biographies, clippings, death notice, delegate mandate, financial records and correspondence, insurance correspondence, list of articles, travel documents, arranged alphabetically by physical form
Letters arranged alphabetically by correspondent. Includes some letters neither to nor from Walther Schevenels
Articles, notes, speeches and related correspondence arranged chronologically by title

Circulars, clippings, correspondence, financial statements, membership list, minutes, press releases, publications, reports and statutes relating to Schevenels's tenure as General Secretary of the IFTU. Includes minutes of the Board of Trustees, which disposed of the IFTU's affairs following its dissolution in 1945

Clippings, constitution, correspondence, declarations, minutes, publications, reports and speech relating to Schevenels's position as Assistant General Secretary of the WFTU, successor organization to the IFTU

did.unittitle: EUROPEAN RECOVERY PROGRAM (ERP), TRADE UNION ADVISORY COMMITTEE,

scopecontent.p: Correspondence and press release relating to Schevenels's position as Secretary of the Trade Union Advisory Committee of the ERP

did.unittitle: EUROPEAN REGIONAL ORGANIZATION (ERO) OF THE INTERNATIONAL

scopecontent.p: Clippings, constitution, correspondence, manifestos, memoranda, minutes, notes, policy statements, press releases, proceedings, publications, questionnaires, reports and resolutions relating to Schevenels's position as General Secretary of the European Regional Organization of the ICFTU
Bulletins, chronology, clippings, minutes, notes, obituaries, pamphlets, paper, political cartoons, press release, program, publications, reports and speech arranged alphabetically by subject
Cards with addresses of correspondents. Unsorted

List of articles written by Schevenels. Includes program mentioning speaking engagement
Controversy involving objections by American Federation of Labor to Schevenels's appointment as Secretary, Trade Union Advisory Committee, European Recovery Program, 1949

Twerenbold, Rosalie, 1947. Includes correspondence with Rene Meyer

"Atlantic Cooperation: Road to European Unity?," 1962 February 2. Typescript

Emergency International Trade Union Council, 1942-44. Includes correspondence and notes by Schevenels
Reports, 1933-1945. Includes correspondence, reports submitted to IFTU by national representatives and report by Schevenels on Italian trade unions, 1944
